Sentencas: The effects of Gd2Ti2O7 (GT) as sintering aid on the densification, electrical properties and thermal expansion of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 (GDC) are examined.
Titulo: Influences of Gd2Ti2O7 sintering aid on the densification, ionic conductivity and thermal expansion of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Samples added with TiO2 sintering aid are also tested for comparison.
Titulo: Influences of Gd2Ti2O7 sintering aid on the densification, ionic conductivity and thermal expansion of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that by sintering at a moderate temperature of 1400 degrees C for 5 h, the relative density of the GT-added GDC can reach over 97% as the molar ratio of GT/GDC reaches 0.02 or higher.
Titulo: Influences of Gd2Ti2O7 sintering aid on the densification, ionic conductivity and thermal expansion of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: XRD analysis indicates that GT does not react with GDC, while TiO2 reacts with Gd in GDC to form GT.
Titulo: Influences of Gd2Ti2O7 sintering aid on the densification, ionic conductivity and thermal expansion of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The ionic conductivities of the GT-added and the TiO2-added GDC are analyzed by AC impedance spectroscopy at 500-700 degrees C.
Titulo: Influences of Gd2Ti2O7 sintering aid on the densification, ionic conductivity and thermal expansion of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The result shows that although the ionic conductivity of the GT-added GDC decreases as the GT/GDC molar ratio increases up to 0.05, it is still higher than that of 8YSZ and much higher than that of the GDC added with an equivalent amount of TiO2.
Titulo: Influences of Gd2Ti2O7 sintering aid on the densification, ionic conductivity and thermal expansion of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is also found that the thermal expansion coefficient of GDC decreases as the amount of GT increases.
Titulo: Influences of Gd2Ti2O7 sintering aid on the densification, ionic conductivity and thermal expansion of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results show that GT is an excellent sintering aid for GDC, and the optimal molar ratio of GT/GDC is 0.02 in terms of densification and ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Influences of Gd2Ti2O7 sintering aid on the densification, ionic conductivity and thermal expansion of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells
